verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* \w came|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Tertullus|strong="G5061"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* orator, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w went|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G0846"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w*, \w Tertullus|strong="G5061"\w* \w began|strong="G0757"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Whereas|strong="G1161"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* thee \w we|strong="G2532"\w* live \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* rectified \w by|strong="G1223"\w* thy \w providence|strong="G4307"\w*,

\w We|strong="G3778"\w* accept \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w always|strong="G1223"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* places, \w most|strong="G4183"\w* \w excellent|strong="G2903"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w be|strong="G4674"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w further|strong="G4183"\w* tedious \w to|strong="G2443"\w* thee, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* desire thee \w of|strong="G1909"\w* thy clemency \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w us|strong="G1909"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* few \w words|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w We|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2147"\w* pestilent \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* raising seditions \w among|strong="G2596"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G3625"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* author \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* sedition \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sect|strong="G0139"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Nazarenes|strong="G3480"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath gone \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* profane \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: \w whom|strong="G3739"\w*, \w we|strong="G3739"\w* having apprehended, \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* judged according \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* law.
But Lysias the tribune coming upon us, with great violence took him away out of our hands;

Commanding \w his|strong="G0846"\w* accusers \w to|strong="G1410"\w* come \w to|strong="G1410"\w* thee: \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* thou mayest thyself, \w by|strong="G3844"\w* examination, \w have|strong="G1473"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, whereof \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* added, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w were|strong="G2453"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G0846"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, (\w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* making \w a|strong="G1510"\w* sign \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w*:) \w Knowing|strong="G1987"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* thou hast \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w judge|strong="G2923"\w* \w over|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w good|strong="G1510"\w* courage \w answer|strong="G0611"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1519"\w* thou mayest \w understand|strong="G1921"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w yet|strong="G4771"\w* \w but|strong="G1473"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w since|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* adore \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* disputing \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w causing|strong="G4160"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* concourse \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w prove|strong="G3936"\w* unto thee \w the|strong="G3739"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* whereof \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* thee, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w call|strong="G3004"\w* \w a|strong="G3739"\w* heresy, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4100"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* Father \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w believing|strong="G4100"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*:

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* look \w for|strong="G1519"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w shall|strong="G1342"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* herein \w do|strong="G2192"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* endeavour \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w always|strong="G1223"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w* offence \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* towards \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G4160"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G4160"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w offerings|strong="G4376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* vows.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w purified|strong="G0048"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w*: \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* tumult.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* thee, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G3739"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*:

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w let|strong="G3004"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, if \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w any|strong="G1909"\w* iniquity, \w when|strong="G2147"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w*,

Except \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w be|strong="G3778"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* only \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w am|strong="G2919"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w put|strong="G0306"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w off|strong="G2596"\w*, having most \w certain|strong="G2596"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="G3598"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w Lysias|strong="G3079"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune shall \w come|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w will|strong="G0846"\w* hear \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G1299"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3367"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* easy, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3367"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* prohibit \w any|strong="G3367"\w* \w of|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w friends|strong="G2398"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* minister unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*, \w coming|strong="G3854"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Drusilla|strong="G1409"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w sent|strong="G3343"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w that|strong="G0191"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G4198"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* treated \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* chastity, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w terrified|strong="G1719"\w*, \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*: \w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w go|strong="G4198"\w* thy \w way|strong="G4198"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* convenient \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* send \w for|strong="G4012"\w* thee.

\w Hoping|strong="G1679"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* withal, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w money|strong="G5536"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w cause|strong="G1325"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* oftentimes sending \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* spoke \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w two|strong="G1333"\w* \w years|strong="G1333"\w* \w were|strong="G2453"\w* ended, \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w had|strong="G3972"\w* \w for|strong="G2309"\w* successor Portius \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* being \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2309"\w* shew \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w a|strong="G2983"\w* pleasure, \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w*.
